scripts.test: bun run lint && npm run test:snowflake && npm run test:symbolic
scripts.test:snowflake: npm run ./test/Snowflake/default.test.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/difference.test.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/epoch.test.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/place_id.test.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/sequence.test.ts
scripts.test:symbolic: npm run ./test/Symbolic/default.test.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/difference.test.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/epoch.test.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/place_id.test.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/sequence.test.ts
